content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a `write_to_file` command to create a new Python script at "/path/to/new_script.py" and an `execute_shell` command to run it. The script printed "Hello, World!" to the console. Then, I received a `google` command to search for the best places to visit in Europe, which returned a list of URLs. Next, I received a `get_text_summary` command to summarize the Wikipedia page on Python programming language and it returned an overview of Python's history, features, syntax, and applications. I also received a `write_to_file` command to write text to a file at "/path/to/file" and it was successful. However, when I received a `read_file` command for "/path/to/file", it failed with a "no such file or directory" error.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "python /path/to/new_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Hello, World!\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best places to visit in Europe"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/best-europe-vacations/", "https://www.touropia.com/best-places-to-visit-in-europe/", "https://www.cntraveller.com/gallery/places-to-visit-europe", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/ceciliarodriguez/2023/02/10/the-20-best-places-in-europe-to-visit-in-2023-according-to-european-best-destinations/", "https://santorinidave.com/best-cities-europe", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/ceciliarodriguez/2022/02/13/ready-for-europe-the-20-best-and-safest-places-for-travel-and-tourism--in-2022-according-to-european-best-destinations/", "https://tourscanner.com/blog/best-places-to-visit-in-europe/", "https://www.ourescapeclause.com/best-cities-to-visit-in-europe/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)", "question": "What is Python?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : an overview of the Python programming language, including its history, features, syntax, and various implementations. It highlights Python\'s versatility and popularity in a wide range of applications, such as scientific computing, web development, and artificial intelligence. The text also includes resources and references related to Python, such as books and software libraries.', type='action_result'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /path/to/file failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": "This is the text to write to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": "This is the text to append to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
